name: MPGA Home Page Implementation
description: Build the home page for Minnesota Public Golf Association's public site with a classic/traditional golf club aesthetic.

items.description: Replace cyan primary color palette with MPGA green palette in Tailwind config
steps_to_verify: Confirm all 10 primary color stops (50-950) use green hues
Run pnpm build to verify no CSS errors

items.description: Add gold accent color palette to Tailwind config
steps_to_verify: Confirm gold-500 is #DBA507 or similar gold shade
Confirm gold color palette has at least 50, 100, 500, 600, 700 stops
Run pnpm build to verify no CSS errors

items.description: Add secondary color palette (#07485B) to Tailwind config
steps_to_verify: Confirm secondary color palette has consistent shade range
Run pnpm build to verify no CSS errors

items.description: Add Google Fonts (Playfair Display for headings, Inter for body) to layout.tsx
steps_to_verify: Confirm next/font/google imports Playfair_Display and Inter
Confirm font variables are applied to html or body element
Run pnpm dev and inspect font-family in browser DevTools
Verify headings use Playfair Display, body uses Inter

items.description: Add typography CSS variables for font families to Tailwind config
steps_to_verify: Confirm --font-heading variable exists for Playfair Display
Classes like font-heading and font-body should be available

items.description: Initialize shadcn/ui in packages/ui with components.json config
steps_to_verify: Confirm style is set to 'new-york' or 'default'
Confirm tailwindCSS config points to correct path
Confirm aliases are configured for @mpga/ui imports

items.description: Add required dependencies for shadcn/ui (tailwind-merge, class-variance-authority, clsx, lucide-react)
steps_to_verify: Confirm dependencies include: tailwind-merge, class-variance-authority, clsx
Confirm dependencies include: lucide-react for icons
Run pnpm install from root - no errors

items.description: Create cn() utility function for className merging
steps_to_verify: Confirm cn() function uses clsx and tailwind-merge
Confirm function is exported from packages/ui/src/index.ts

items.description: Install shadcn/ui Button component
steps_to_verify: Confirm Button component is exported from packages/ui
Confirm buttonVariants includes primary, secondary, outline variants

items.description: Install shadcn/ui Card component
steps_to_verify: Confirm Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardDescription, CardContent, CardFooter are exported

items.description: Install shadcn/ui Navigation Menu component
steps_to_verify: Confirm NavigationMenu, NavigationMenuItem, NavigationMenuLink are exported

items.description: Install shadcn/ui Carousel component
steps_to_verify: Confirm Carousel, CarouselContent, CarouselItem, CarouselPrevious, CarouselNext are exported

items.description: Install shadcn/ui Sheet component (for mobile menu)
steps_to_verify: Confirm Sheet, SheetTrigger, SheetContent, SheetHeader, SheetTitle are exported

items.description: Create Header component with desktop navigation using NavigationMenu
steps_to_verify: Confirm Header has sticky position with white background
Confirm navigation links: Home, Tournaments, Match Play, Members, News
Confirm MPGA logo links to home
Confirm desktop nav is visible on screens >= 768px

items.description: Add mobile hamburger menu to Header using Sheet component
steps_to_verify: Confirm hamburger icon visible on screens < 768px
Confirm clicking hamburger opens Sheet slide-out menu
Confirm Sheet contains all navigation links
Confirm Sheet closes when link is clicked
Test in browser at mobile viewport width

items.description: Create Footer component with 4-column layout
steps_to_verify: Confirm 4 columns: Navigation, About, Contact, Social
Confirm copyright line at bottom with current year

items.description: Create FeatureCard component using Card primitive
steps_to_verify: Confirm props: icon (emoji/ReactNode), title, description, href
Confirm hover effect: subtle lift shadow
Confirm entire card is clickable link

items.description: Create HeroSlide component with 66/33 split layout
steps_to_verify: Confirm props: imageUrl, title, subtitle, venue, date, ctaHref
Confirm images added to assets: systemName matches image name
Confirm content side has primary-900 green background

items.description: Create HeroCarousel component using Carousel primitive
steps_to_verify: Confirm props: slides array of HeroSlide data
Confirm navigation dots show current slide

items.description: Create NewsCard component using Card primitive
steps_to_verify: Confirm props: title, date, excerpt, href
Confirm excerpt is truncated to 2-3 lines

items.description: Export all custom components from packages/ui index
steps_to_verify: Confirm exports: Header, Footer, FeatureCard, HeroSlide, HeroCarousel, NewsCard
Confirm exports: Button, Card, NavigationMenu, Carousel, Sheet components
Run pnpm build in packages/ui - no errors

items.description: Add Header and Footer to public app layout
steps_to_verify: Confirm main content is wrapped in flex-grow container
Run pnpm dev and verify header/footer appear on all pages

items.description: Create getUpcomingTournaments() query function
steps_to_verify: Confirm getUpcomingTournaments() joins tournamentInstance, tournament, golfCourse
Confirm returns: id, name, startDate, tournamentName, venueName
Confirm orders by startDate ASC, limits to 5

items.description: Create getAboutContent() query function
Create getFeatureCards() query function
steps_to_verify: Confirm maps contentType to route: T1->/tournaments, M1->/match-play, C1->/members

items.description: Create getLatestAnnouncements() query function
steps_to_verify: Confirm returns: id, title, text, createDate

items.description: Create isOffseason() utility function
steps_to_verify: Confirm isOffseason() checks if current date has no upcoming tournaments
Used to determine if hero shows tournaments or logo slide

items.description: Create revalidation API endpoint for ISR
steps_to_verify: Confirm POST handler accepts secret and path query params
Confirm validates secret against REVALIDATE_SECRET env var
Confirm returns 401 if secret is invalid

items.description: Add REVALIDATE_SECRET to environment configuration
steps_to_verify: Confirm .env has actual REVALIDATE_SECRET value set

items.description: Build Hero section on home page with carousel
steps_to_verify: Confirm HeroCarousel renders with tournament data
Confirm offseason fallback shows logo slide
Visually verify carousel works in browser

items.description: Build Feature Cards section on home page (3-column grid)
steps_to_verify: Confirm page.tsx fetches feature cards content
Confirm 3 FeatureCards render in grid layout
Confirm cards have correct icons and links

items.description: Build About MPGA section on home page
steps_to_verify: Confirm section has 'About MPGA' heading with serif font

items.description: Build Latest News section on home page
steps_to_verify: Confirm 3 NewsCards render in grid layout
Confirm 'View All News' link points to /news

items.description: Add proper page metadata and styling to home page
steps_to_verify: Confirm page title is 'MPGA - Minnesota Public Golf Association'
Confirm page description is set appropriately
Confirm sections have proper vertical spacing
Confirm background colors match design system

items.description: Run TypeScript type checking across workspace
Run ESLint across workspace
steps_to_verify: Confirm no warnings in new code

items.description: Visual verification of complete home page
steps_to_verify: Verify header displays logo and nav links
Verify hero carousel shows tournament data
Verify feature cards display with correct links
Verify about section renders database content
Verify news section shows 3 latest articles
Resize to mobile (<768px), verify hamburger menu works
